Class AuctionHouse

public final class AuctionHouse extends Object
Represents the Novaconomy Auction House

      Parameters:
      owner - The owner of the item.
      item - The item to add.
      price - The price of the item.
      buyNow - Whether or not the item is a buy now item.
      loose - Whether or not the price is loose.
      Returns:
      The auction product that was added.

    • purchase

      public static void purchase(@NotNull @NotNull Player purchaser, @NotNull @NotNull AuctionProduct product) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Purchases a buy now item from the auction house.
      Parameters:
      purchaser - The purchaser of the item.
      product - The auction to purchase.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the purchaser or auction is null, or if the auction is not a buy now auction.
